content.rendered:
Brocque Preece graduated from the University of New South Wales, Sydney, Australia with a Degree in Engineering and Naval Architecture with Honours Class. He has worked in Port and Harbour consulting in London and New York where he has undertaken terminal design project mooring analyses, operational simulation and ship simulation modelling, among numerous other tasks. He has been involved in the assessment and investigation of vessel movements and moorings for claims resulting from a moored vessel in extreme weather and passing vessel scenarios.

Discipline: Naval Architect / Engineer
Specialism: Post incident investigations & incident reconstruction
Expert Witness Expertise: Expert opinions & technical analysis

Contact

London | +44 (0) 7920 339 860
